      • getQualifierMatcher

        public QualifierMatcher getQualifierMatcher()
        Get the configured qualifer matcher. The initial qualifier matcher is Qualifiers.matchAny().
        Returns:
        The qualifier matcher.

      • setQualifierMatcher

        public BindRuleBuilder setQualifierMatcher(QualifierMatcher qm)
        Set the qualifier matcher.
        Parameters:
        qm - The qualifier matcher.

      • getSatisfaction

        public Satisfaction getSatisfaction()
        Get the target satisfaction.
        Returns:
        The configured satisfaction, or null if none is configured.

      • setSatisfaction

        public BindRuleBuilder setSatisfaction(Satisfaction sat)
        Set the satisfaction to bind to. This will unset the implementation class and result in a satisfaction binding.
        Parameters:
        sat - The satisfaction.

      • getImplementation

        public Class<?> getImplementation()
        Get the target implementation.
        Returns:
        The target implementation, or null if none is configured.

      • setImplementation

        public BindRuleBuilder setImplementation(Class<?> type)
        Set the target implementation. This will unset the satisfaction and result in an implementation class binding.
        Parameters:
        type - The implementation class.

      • isTerminal

        public boolean isTerminal()
        Query whether the binding will be terminal.
        Returns:
        true if the binding will be terminal.

      • setTerminal

        public BindRuleBuilder setTerminal(boolean term)
        Set whether the binding will be terminal.
        Parameters:
        term - true to create a terminal binding.
        See Also:
        BindingFlag.TERMINAL

      • setFlags

        public BindRuleBuilder setFlags(EnumSet<BindingFlag> fs)
        Set the flags on this bind rule.
        Parameters:
        fs - The flags.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

        Add a flag to the constructed bind rule.
